docs.lead_paragraph: Daimler AG's luxury brand Mercedes-Benz said it is cooperating with China's anti-monopoly authorities over an investigation into unspecified matters, after local Chinese media reported the German automaker's Shanghai office had been raided.

headline.main: Daimler Says Assisting Chinese Authorities in Investigation
headline.print_headline: Daimler Says Assisting Chinese Authorities in Investigation

docs.snippet: Daimler AG's luxury brand Mercedes-Benz said it is cooperating with China's anti-monopoly authorities over an investigation into unspecified matters, after local Chinese media reported the German automaker's Shanghai office had been raided.

docs.lead_paragraph: This side dish is a way to take advantage of the mini sweet peppers that are showing up by the bag in supermarkets. They should be roasted briefly and not peeled.

docs.lead_paragraph: Poorly fed children rob Africa of up to 16 percent of its potential growth, making investment in programs to end malnutrition as critical to the continent’s future as building bridges and roads, African leaders and development officials said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Child Malnutrition Costs Africa Its Future Growth

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States will announce nearly $1 billion in business deals, increase funding for peacekeeping and commit billions of dollars to expanding food and power programs in Africa during a summit this week, U.S. and development officials say.

headline.main: Billions of Dollars in Deals and Funding to Be Announced at Africa Summit
headline.print_headline: Billions of Dollars in Deals and Funding to Be Announced at Africa Summit

docs.lead_paragraph: To grab some of TV’s ad dollars, the social network is trying to help advertisers reach the perfect customer.

headline.main: How Facebook Sold You Krill Oil
headline.print_headline: How Facebook Sold You Krill Oil

docs.abstract: Facebook, looking to grab some of television’s ad dollars, is trying to help advertisers reach the perfect customer; social network holds 'publishing garages' to help clients like Reckitt Benckiser plan advertising initiatives; ads for company's MegaRed krill oil product reached 18.1 million women aged 45 and up on Facebook.
docs.snippet: To grab some of TV’s ad dollars, the social network is trying to help advertisers reach the perfect customer.
